package_name: Name of the packages (Eg: vault) Mandatory Argument.
github_url: Github URL for the package (Eg: https://github.com/hashicorp/vault.git) Mandatory Argument.
version: Release version or Tag version available in github repo (Eg: v1.12.0). Mandatory Argument.
category: Category of the build-script (Eg: default/rhp). Optional Argument.
package_dir: Directory path to the package on build-scripts repo (Eg: v/vault/)
docker_cmd: This is a generic Docker command that can be run by default on any version. If no tag details mentioned, this docker command will be consider for buiding the docker image. (Eg: docker build -t ${package_name}:$PACKAGE_VERSION ${dir})
build_script: Default build script for the package. If no build_script mentioned in below version tags, this build-script will be picked for build and validation. (Eg: vault_ubi_8.5.sh)
docker_build: Boolean variable to enable or diasble building docker image for a package. Optional argument. Default value is `true` (Eg: true/false)
validate_build_script: Boolean variable to enable or diasble the build-script execution for a package. Optional argument. Default value is `true` (Eg: true/false)
use_non_root_user: Boolean variable to run build-script as non root user. Optional argument. Default value is `false` (Eg: true/false)

version string(s)/version regex(es) (Eg:.dir: Directory name on which `docker build` should run. Mention directory name under `Dockerfile` directory of a package. (Eg: 8.1.0_ubi_8 - Incase if elasticsearch)
version string(s)/version regex(es) (Eg:.build_script: Version specific build-script. If not mentioned, default build-script will be picked which is mentioned at outside of Tag details (Eg: elasticsearch_v8.1.1_ubi_8.5.sh).
version string(s)/version regex(es) (Eg:.base_docker_image: Mention base docker image which is used in DockerFile (FROM ). Optional argument. Default value is `registry.redhat.com/ubi8/ubi:latest`.
version string(s)/version regex(es) (Eg:.base_docker_variant: Base docker image variant. Allowed values are | redhat | ubuntu | alpine |. Optional argument. Default value is `redhat`.

patches.PATCH_NAME_USED_AS_BUILD_ARG_IN_DOCKERFI: Raw URL path to the patch in build-scripts (Eg: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ppc64le/build-scripts/master/e/elasticsearch/elasticsearch_v8.1.1.patch - In case of elasticsearch).
